title: Copies - UK
question: How many copies of the grant do you need for use in the UK?
paragraph1: You’ll receive a grant of probate when your application has been processed.
paragraph2: You may need extra copies of the grant to send to different asset holders, for example, a copy for shares and a copy for a property.
bullet2: 50 pence for every copy after that
questionOld: How many extra copies of the grant do you need for use in the UK?
paragraph1Old: You’ll receive a grant of probate when your application has been processed.
paragraph2Old: You may need extra copies of the grant to send to different asset holders, for example, a copy for shares and a copy for a property.

uk.required: Enter the number of UK copies you need. Enter ‘0’ if you don’t need any copies.
